title: Saddlin' Up
body: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway.

title: Life's Tough
body: Life is tough, but it’s tougher if you’re stupid.

title: Bear Trouble
body: Sometimes, you get the bear. Sometimes, the bear gets you.

title: Whiskey Glass Half Full
body: I don't believe in pessimism. If something doesn't come up the way you want, forge ahead. If you think it's going to rain, it will.
